Name: Emblem of Severed Fate
Title: Emblem of Severed Fate: Ornate Kabuto
Desc: Thirteen years went by like a dream.\nThe scarlet snow flies through the shadowed pass like smoke.\nYou have now gone afar.

Talent.Name: Emblem of Severed Fate
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: </color>The character to which this is attached gains 1 $[K310].\nThe DMG dealt by the character's Elemental Bursts is increased by 2 (once per Round).\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)

K310.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>
K310.Desc: Characters must consume {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.\nWhen characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy.
